global.description: Configure bisic function of virtural access.

enable.description: Enable/disable state of virtural access. Default is no configuration.

port-extend-enable.description: Enable/disable state of virtural access port-extend. Default is no configuration.

role.description: Role of virtual access. Default is no configuration.

ap.description: Configure ap of virtual access configuration.

global.description: Configure bisic master function of virtural access.

aps.description: List of ap configuration of virtural access.

ap.description: Configure ap function for virtural access.

admin-ip-address.description: Ap admin IP address. After this node is deleted, the ap and master are disconnected, affecting normal service functions.

ap-interface-infos.description: List of ap interface information parameter.

ap-interface-info.description: Operational data of ap interface information.

optical-enable.description: Enable/disable the optical module abnormal monitor.

tad-trans-alarm-if-downs.description: List of Global TAD Alarm Status Information.

tad-trans-alarm-if-down.description: Configure Global TAD Alarm Status Information.

port-type.description: Global TAD Port Type. If the hardware does not support it, returning to the current interface does not support it.

alarm-type.description: Global TAD Alarm Type. If the hardware does not support it, returning to the current interface does not support it.

if-down.description: Enable/disable Global TAD Alarm If down.
